title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository: a lightweight, extensible framework for running large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, letting Node and browser apps chat with local models in a few lines of code.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip-installable wrapper around the Ollama REST API with sync/async support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a first-class LLM and embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now renamed “Open WebUI”)—chat history, model management, RAG uploads, user auth.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Maven artifact offering synchronous & asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, conversation persistence and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama: idiomatic Ruby wrapper over the REST API with streaming support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed, async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-node
summary: Unofficial Node.js client with additional helpers for embeddings and model file creation.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app bootstrapped with Vite that connects to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that registers Ollama models as both generators and embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# / .NET client for Ollama, available as NuGet package with async streaming support.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; go-gettable with context-based streaming helpers.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) with one-line commands to run Ollama in containers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Reference repo showing how to build a RAG pipeline combining Ollama, ChromaDB and LangChain.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated list of custom Modelfiles and quantized models ready for ollama pull.
